definition: the act of making up your mind about something
details:
noun
- the act of making up your mind about something
= example: the act of making up your mind about something
= synonyms: determination
- the trait of resoluteness as evidenced by firmness of character or purpose
= synonyms: decisiveness
- a position or opinion or judgment reached after consideration
= example: a position or opinion or judgment reached after consideration
= synonyms: determination
- the outcome of a game or contest
= example: the outcome of a game or contest
- a boxing victory won on points when no knockout has occurred
= example: a boxing victory won on points when no knockout has occurred
